Usage Guide¶

Basic Operations¶

  1. Adding a Task: - Type your task in the text input field - Click “Add Task” button

  2. Updating a Task: - Click “Update” button next to the task - Edit the text in the popup - Click “Update” to save changes

  3. Deleting a Task: - Click “Delete” button next to the task
